::Zardus::

Zardus glances from Rage to Deamon Wulf, holding up a finger to say 
for him to wait. If DevilDuer's shot didn't stun her, he'd give the 
signal for Deamon Wulf to slash.

Zardus watches Rage carefully, his other hand near his plasma 
launcher.
